name: Arcanaloth
damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
descriptions: The arcanaloth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15). The arcanaloth can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

descriptions.raw: At will: alter self, darkness, heat metal, invisibility (self only), magic missile
descriptions.hyperlinked: At will: alter self, darkness, heat metal, invisibility (self only), magic missile

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
descriptions: The arcanaloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Magic Weapons.
descriptions: The arcanaloth's weapon attacks are magical.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: The arcanaloth is a 16th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). The arcanaloth has the following wizard spells prepared:

descriptions.raw: Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation
descriptions.hyperlinked: Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation

descriptions.raw: 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, identify, shield, Tenser's floating disk
descriptions.hyperlinked: 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, identify, shield, Tenser's floating disk

descriptions.raw: 2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, mirror image, phantasmal force, suggestion
descriptions.hyperlinked: 2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, mirror image, phantasmal force, suggestion

descriptions.raw: 5th level (2 slots): contact other plane, hold monster
descriptions.hyperlinked: 5th level (2 slots): contact other plane, hold monster

actions.name: Claws.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage. The target must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Teleport.
descriptions: The arcanaloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

actions.name: Variant: Summon Yugoloth (1/Day).
descriptions: The yugoloth attempts a magical summoning.
An arcanaloth has a 40 percent chance of summoning one arcanaloth.

A summoned yugoloth appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, does as it pleases, and can't summon other yugoloths. The summoned yugoloth remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner takes a bonus action to dismiss it.
